content:
Metadata Infrastructure

    Metadata support


    • Attributes. (name, value) pairs, such as (“Author”, “Neal Stephenson”) can be created, modified, queried, and read on Web resources.
    • Binary relationships. Allow relations between resources to be captured (e.g. source code “implements” requirements, “table of contents”)

    Infrastructure for recording information about Web data
